product.name: 32.8Ft Neon Rope Lights,Flexible Led Rope Lights Control with App/Remote,Multiple Modes Rope Lights,IP65 Outdoor RGB Led Neon Lights Waterproof,Music Sync Gaming Led Neon Light Strip for Bedroom Decor
product.description:
Welcome to the world of LETIANPAI, where we bring you the finest quality neon RGB LED strip lights to transform your space in ways you've never imagined. Our 32.8ft Neon LED Rope Lights are flexible, easy to install, and come with a variety of features that will make your decor stand out. Whether you're looking to enhance the ambiance of your living room, illuminate your outdoor patio, or create a gaming paradise, our has got you covered.
Our 32.8ft Neon LED Rope Lights are designed to be used in a variety of indoor and outdoor settings. The flexible neon LED strip lights can be easily installed on walls, ceilings, floors, or any other surface you desire. With the included firm buckle，you can mount the lights quickly and securely.
RGB neon LED rope lights offer unparalleled connectivity options. You can use the provided remote control or download the "Lotus Lantern" app on your Google or iOS device to control the lights via Bluetooth. The app provides access to a staggering 16 million colors, as well as various automatic modes, music sync, microphone functions, and timer switch features.
Want to add some flair to your party or create a synchronized light show with your favorite tunes? Our neon LED rope lights can sync with your music, allowing you to create a visually stunning experience. You can also personalize the lights to match your decor or mood by changing the colors and patterns through the app.
Neon LED rope lights can be connected to multiple strips through the "Lotus Lantern" app, giving you complete control over your lighting setup. This feature is perfect for those looking to create a complex lighting arrangement or simply wanting to expand their existing setup.
Our LED neon lights are energy efficient, consuming less power than traditional incandescent bulbs. This not only helps you save on energy bills but also extends the life of your lights. The low voltage design ensures safety and makes them ideal for indoor and outdoor use.
With neon strip lights, the possibilities are endless. Create your own DIY signs, neon art, or custom lighting installations. The flexible and durable design makes it easy to shape the lights to your desired configuration.LETIANPAI 32.8ft Neon LED Rope Lights offer a perfect blend of functionality, versatility, and style. Elevate your indoor and outdoor decor with ease and connectivity.
These neon strips are not only visually stunning but also come with unique features that will enhance your gaming experience.
One of the standout features of our Neon LED Flex Lights is the music sync mode. With this mode, the lights will pulsate and change colors according to the rhythm and beat of the music. Imagine immersing yourself in your favorite game while the neon lights around you dance to the music, creating a truly dynamic and captivating atmosphere.
Another impressive feature is the microphone mode. In this mode, the neon lights will react to sound, whether it's your voice or in-game audio. Every shout, cheer, or explosion will be accompanied by a burst of vibrant colors from the neon strip, adding an extra layer of excitement to your gaming sessions.
Our neon lights are incredibly versatile and can be easily cut to fit any desired length. Whether you want to line the walls, frame your gaming setup, or create custom shapes, the flexible neon LED strip lights can be easily manipulated to achieve your desired effect. Additionally, our neon strips are waterproof, ensuring durability and longevity even in humid gaming environments.
Installation and control of the LED Neon Flex Lights are made simple with our remote and app "Lotus Lantern". Adjust the brightness, choose from a wide range of colors, and switch between different modes all at your fingertips. The remote also includes a timer switch function, allowing you to set specific times for the lights to turn on and off automatically.
Safety is a priority for us, which is why our neon lights operate on low voltage. This not only reduces the risk of electrical accidents but also ensures that the lights remain cool to the touch even after extended use. Additionally, our neon rope lights are designed to be energy-efficient, saving you money on your electricity bill.
Create your own unique gaming atmosphere with our Neon Gaming Lights. Whether you want to showcase your favorite team's colors, create a neon sign with your gamertag, or simply add a touch of vibrancy to your game room, our neon LED lights offer endless possibilities.
Our neon light strips are designed with an IP68 waterproof rating, effectively preventing water and dust from entering and ensuring their normal operation in harsh outdoor environments.
Whether you are at an outdoor restaurant, cafe, shopping center plaza, or in a courtyard, garden, or open-air event venue, our neon light strips will bring you a unique lighting effect. With brightness and color richness comparable to traditional neon lights, they create stunning visual effects for your outdoor space.
Our neon light strips use high-quality LED light sources, which are energy-efficient and have a long lifespan. The IP68 waterproof design effectively prevents short circuits or moisture damage caused by rainwater, extending their service life. Moreover, our neon light strips have excellent durability and shock resistance, withstanding the challenges of external environments.
In addition to their waterproof performance, our neon light strips are easy to install and maintain. Simply fix the light strip in the appropriate position and connect the power supply. Furthermore, our neon light strips support various lighting modes and remote control functions, allowing you to choose different lighting effects according to your needs and create different atmospheres and scenes.
Our neon light strips are the ideal choice for outdoor lighting, with an IP68 waterproof rating to ensure their long-term stable operation in outdoor environments. Whether you want to create a unique commercial ambiance or add a touch of vibrant color to your home garden, our neon light strips can meet your needs. May our light strips bring more highlights and surprises to your outdoor space!
Whether it's a bedroom, living room, bar, game room, deck, patio, or garden, our versatile lights can transform any area into an enchanting wonderland.
Create a cozy and inviting atmosphere in your bedroom with our Neon Rope Lights. Wrap them around your bed frame or hang them on the wall for a soft, dreamy glow that will help you unwind after a long day.
In your living room, let our Neon Rope Lights be the centerpiece of your entertainment area. With their vibrant colors and flexible design, they can be easily shaped and arranged to complement your existing decor. Whether you're hosting a party or simply relaxing with friends and family, these lights will add a touch of elegance to your space.
Looking to enhance the ambience of your bar or game room? Our Neon Rope Lights are the perfect solution. Create a captivating neon sign or highlight your favorite memorabilia for an exciting and lively atmosphere that will impress your guests.
Take your outdoor spaces to the next level with our Neon Rope Lights. Illuminate your deck or patio for those summer evenings spent outdoors. Or create a magical atmosphere in your garden, turning it into a stunning oasis that can be enjoyed day and night.
No matter the occasion or setting, our Neon Rope Lights are sure to bring life to any space. With their versatility and enchanting glow, they are the perfect addition to any indoor or outdoor area. Transform your surroundings and let the magic unfold with our Neon Rope Lights.
product.bullet_points:
• Diverse Features for Customizable Ambiance Our 32.8 foot RGB LED neon strip lights come packed with versatile functionality to elevate any space. Adjust brightness levels to suit your mood, explore 29 dynamic lighting modes, and sync the lights with music or ambient sound via the built-in microphone—creating a personalized, immersive experience. Perfect for gaming setups, DIY neon art projects, or adding subtle atmosphere to rooms, these flexible strips adapt seamlessly to your creative vision.
• Weather-Resistant & Family-Safe Design Engineered for durability, these neon lights are waterproof, making them ideal for both indoor decor and outdoor installations without worrying about rain or moisture damage. Safe for all environments, they operate at a cool temperature, eliminating heat-related risks—an excellent choice for homes with children or elderly family members.
• Effortless Control Options Take charge of your lighting with ease using the included remote or the “Lotus Lantern” mobile app. The app lets you schedule automatic on/off times via its timer function, ensuring convenience whether you’re at home or away. Customize settings effortlessly, putting the power to transform your space right in your hands.
• Flexible & Tailor-Made for Any Space Designed for versatility, these neon strips can be easily cut to your desired length, fitting seamlessly into bedrooms, living rooms, workspaces, or any area needing a touch of light. With adaptable modes like fading, flashing, and strobing, you can craft the perfect ambiance for parties, quiet nights, or everything in between—letting your creativity shine.
• High-Quality Performance & Energy Efficiency Powered by low-voltage technology, these neon LED rope lights offer long-lasting, energy-efficient operation while delivering a vibrant, eye-catching glow. Their sleek design and vivid illumination enhance any environment, making them a smart choice for home decor, office setups, or special events that demand visual impact.
• Certified Quality & Hassle-Free Support All accessories, including the rigorously tested, certified power adapter, meet safety standards for worry-free use. The lights stay cool and consume minimal energy, ensuring reliability and efficiency. We stand behind our product with five-star service: Contact us for installation help or quality-related issues, and we’ll resolve them within 24 hours—offering full refunds or free replacements as needed.
